comments:
When klicking on this nice lightbulb when coding, the following SWT-Error is raised.

I'm not sure if it is related to the timeout of the svn-component. So I just keep that message in the log file.

Thanks.

Thomas.

Is this crash reproducable with a set of steps?

Unfortunately this happens only on a single machine. (on other machines I cannot reproduce this...)
It may help, that this machine is a specially slow one (HP TC1000, Windows XP Tablet Edition) so that there may be some timeout issues involved here.
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 128278 ***
